channel.title: CVE Feed for Castos -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Castos -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-40132|2024-08-03T12:14:39.766Z -- castos -- seriously%20simple%20podcasting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Seriously Simple Podcasting plugin <= 2.16.0 at WordPress, leading to plugin settings change.

item.title: CVE-2024-25599|2024-06-04T17:35:20.357Z -- castos -- seriously%20simple%20podcasting
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Castos Seriously Simple Podcasting allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Seriously Simple Podcasting: from n/a through 3.0.2.
